https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/g7H6VJYT9uKdDsnbuQba4KCrcYt.jpg Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who yearns for love. One day, he encounters the young and beautiful Yan and quickly falls in love with her. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams. Beyond the Dream
